Upcoming Events

Stay informed about our meetings, activities, and opportunities to get involved

Event Calendar

View our complete calendar of events including monthly meetings, special events, and volunteer opportunities.

View Full Calendar (Huly URL TBD)

Our calendar is hosted on Huly and includes detailed information about each event, including time, location, and how to participate.

Monthly Meetings

The Muskegon County Democratic Party holds regular monthly meetings where members discuss party business, plan events, and coordinate campaign activities.

  • Open to all party members
  • Typically held monthly (check calendar for dates)
  • Community members welcome
  • Opportunity to voice your concerns and ideas
  • CIO Hall, 490 W Western Ave, Muskegon , MI 49440

Governance

Pro-Democracy Events

Join us at rallies, marches, and community events where we stand up for democratic values and progressive causes.

  • Voting rights advocacy
  • Community organizing events
  • Coalition building activities
  • Issue-focused campaigns

Check our calendar for upcoming pro-democracy events and ways to get involved in protecting our democratic institutions.

Types of Events

Organizational Meetings

Regular monthly meetings to conduct party business and coordinate activities.

Fundraisers

Support Democratic candidates and causes through our fundraising events.

Campaign Events

Meet Democratic candidates and learn about their platforms at rallies and meet-and-greets.

Voter Registration

Help register voters and ensure everyone has the opportunity to participate in democracy.

Educational Forums

Learn about important issues and policy positions at informational sessions and panels.

Community Service

Give back to our community through volunteer service projects and community outreach.

Stay Informed About Events

Never miss an important event or opportunity to get involved!
